reference.shortdesc: The xmlnsname element identifies mentions of namespace names.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The xmlnsname element is specialized from markupname; the xmlnsname element is defined in the XML-mention domain module. The markupname element is specialized from keyword, and the markupname element is defined in the markup-name domain module.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: SVG markup is specified in an svg element with the namespace http://www.w3.org/2000/svg.
